com.sleepysim

Interface Adversary

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Naive_adversary, Selfish_adversary, Selfish_Eclipse_attack, Stubborn_adversary

    public interface Adversary
    This class operates the corrupted nodes. The adversary acts as a controller of the corrupted nodes.
